SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class LocalModel

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.LocalModel
public class LocalModel extends Object
Singleton local model representation used by the running view.
Updated when a message is received from the server.

    • getInstance

      Get the instance of the singleton
      Returns:
      The local model instance

    • setModel

      public void setModel(StartGameMessage msg)
      Initialize the model from a StartGameMessage object
      Parameters:
      msg - StartGameMessage objet to initialize the model

    • waitStart

      public void waitStart()
      Wait for the game to be started by a StartGameMessage.
      Synchronizes over the startLock object.

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Check if the game has started (client received a StartGameMessage).
      Returns:
      True if the game has started, false otherwise

    • setStarted

      public void setStarted(boolean started)
      Set the game's started state.
      Parameters:
      started - True if the game should start, false to stop

    • addChatMessage

      public void addChatMessage(String nickname, String message, String destination)
      Add an incoming chat message to the chat buffer.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the sender
      message - The message
      destination - The recipient of the message (can be "all" or a player's nickname)

      Parameters:

      nickname - The player's nickname
      score - The new score

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints(String nickname)
      Get the total score for the given player.
      With total score we include: CommonGoal, PersonalGoal, Adjacency and Bonus scores.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname
      Returns:
      The player's score
